get.description: Retrieve the processing errors for a given request

parameters.description: Next page ID

features.description: Feature capabilities of the ERP integration

realmId.description: Realm ID. Realm ID is a unique identifier of the company in the ERP.

timestamp.description: The time when the error was captured

httpStatus.description: The http response code and phrase for the response

errorCode.description: The unique identifier of the error associated with the response or is it error response itself

path.description: The URI of the attempted request

source.description: The type of validation which failed

errorMessage.description: The detailed message of the validation error

errorCode.description: The code of the validation error

deleteAll.description: If deleteAll flag is true foe a request we will delete all data for the given object type before processing the new data.

data.description: Data to be stored from the ERP.

isDeleted.description: Flag to show if this record needs to be deleted.

id.description: Vendor identifier coming from the ERP

currencyCode.description: 3-letter currency code as specified in ISO 4217 - mandatory for Accounting vendors

lastName.description: Last Name - mandatory for Employee type vendors

name.description: The name of the Vendor - mandatory for Accounting vendors

employeeId.description: Employee ID - mandatory for Employee vendors

email.description: Email address - mandatory for Employee vendors

companyId.description: Universally unique identifier of the company in Concur

erpId.description: Universally unique identifier of the ERP for the integration with Concur

requestId.description: Unique identifier of the request in UUID format

isDeleted.description: Flag to show if this record needs to be deleted.

id.description: List identifier coming from the ERP

name.description: List Name coming from the ERP

deleteAll.description: If deleteAll flag is true foe a request we will delete all data for the given object type before processing the new data.

data.description: Data to be stored from the ERP.

Feature.title: Feature
Feature.description: List of Features that the company will use

Field.title: Field
Field.description: List of fields to match with the Financial Information document

alternateFieldId.description: Field ID to match with the Financial Information document

FieldMapping.title: FieldMapping
FieldMapping.description: List of Concur form and fields where the ERP list is used

fields.description: List of fields to match with the Financial Information document

FileMappings.title: FileMappings
FileMappings.description: List of the settings and mappings for each ERP file that the company uses. Could be a single entry if the company does not use files in the ERP

fileId.description: Unique Identifier of the file in the ERP, DEFAULT if single no ERP files are used

listMappings.description: List of ERP list to Concur list mappings

ListMapping.title: ListMapping
ListMapping.description: List of ERP list to Concur list mappings

erpListId.description: List ID of the ERP list

concurListId.description: List ID of the Concur list

fieldMappings.description: List of Concur form and fields where the ERP list is used

erpId.description: Universally unique identifier of the ERP in Concur

features.description: List of Features that the company will use

files.description: List of the settings and mappings for each ERP file that the company uses. Could be a single entry if the company does not use files in the ERP

currencyCode.description: 3-letter currency code as specified in ISO 4217

Feature2.title: Feature2
Feature2.description: Feature capabilities of the ERP integration

FormTypeCode.title: FormTypeCode
FormTypeCode.description: Form type code to match with the Financial Information document

PostingDate.title: PostingDate
PostingDate.description: Posting date: report create, report submit or processor approval date

Type.title: Type
Type.description: The type of the Vendor - EMPLOYEE or ACCOUNTING
